# pingone_system_applications (Data Source)

Data source to retrieve built-in system applications (PingOne Self-Service or PingOne Portal) from PingOne

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "pingone_system_applications" "example" {
  environment_id = var.environment_id
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `environment_id` (String) The ID of the environment to read system applications from.  Must be a valid PingOne resource ID.  This field is immutable and will trigger a replace plan if changed.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `ids` (List of String) The list of IDs of system applications that have been successfully retrieved.
